name: Variant on NHansen's FanFiction.net: Purple/Black
description: Hi! I claim no ownership over NHansen's coding and hard work - I just wanted to share a variant that greatly reduced my eyestrain.
additional_info:
Colour modifications made to:

- Font
- Background
- Foreground
- Hyperlinks
- Etc UI
